meanings.sent1: He is duding his way through the party.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys duding with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat was duding around the house, chasing shadows.
meanings.sent4: The sun was duding behind the clouds, peeking out occasionally.
meanings.sent5: The children were duding happily in the playground, laughing and playing.
